LanguageData.R_Syrup.label: Rice Syrup
LanguageData.R_Syrup.description:
Traditional Japanese sweetener.

Depending on the type of rice as raw material and its processing method, it shows golden to red copper color.

Before the spread of sugar, it was used everywhere in Japan.
LanguageData.R_NaturalSalt.label: Natural salt
LanguageData.R_NaturalSalt.description: Natural salt made by boiling water containing salt and evaporating moisture.

LanguageData.R_VinegarBarrel.description: 発酵させることで米酢ができる。

LanguageData.R_SoySauce.label: Soy sauce
LanguageData.R_SoySauce.description: Soy sauce that can be used for cooking.
